import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; interface LayoutProps { children: React.ReactNode; } const Layout: React.FC = ({ children }) => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const [isSidebarOpen, setIsSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const navigationItems = [ { name: 'Dashboard', path: '/dashboard' }, { name: 'Schemes', path: '/schemes' }, { name: 'Documents', path: '/documents' }, ]; const isActive = (path: string) => { return location.pathname === path; }; return (
{/* Mobile sidebar backdrop */} {isSidebarOpen && (
setIsSidebarOpen(false)} /> )} {/* Sidebar */}
